top_categories.workout_context: Race-pace efforts that mimic Le Grand du Nord's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before May.
Le Grand du Nord's North Shore forest roads, Minnesota Northwoods gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 110 miles.
At mile 60 of 110, glycogen is gone. This workout teaches your body to produce watts on fumes.
5,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
Le Grand du Nord's rolling North Shore gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
At Le Grand du Nord, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Le Grand du Nord, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Le Grand du Nord. Train it until it feels boring.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on rolling North Shore gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 5,000ft of climbing on rolling North Shore gravel does to your power file on race day.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 110 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.
5,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Le Grand du Nord’s 110 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Le Grand du Nord requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on rolling north shore gravel to build confidence. Expect: north shore forest roads, minnesota northwoods gravel, lake superior scenic routes.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Race Simulation, Gravel Specific, and Durability to prepare you for 110 miles of rolling north shore gravel in Grand Marais, Minnesota.
